welcome: 👋 Hello, {name}! Welcome to the Crypto Word Game. This is a word guessing game with a cryptographic twist. What is Cryptography? Simply put, it's the art of 'encoding' messages. In this game, every letter is encoded into a number based on a secret key or 'shift'. How does the game work? We use a classic method called the Caesar Cipher. Normally, A=1, B=2, etc. But with a 'shift', the key can change, for example, A might become 2 or 3! Your task is to guess the hidden letters based on these numeric clues. Type /crypto to start your first game, or /help if you need guidance.
help_intro: Need help? Choose a topic below:
help_text_howtoplay: ❓ How to Play 1. Type /crypto to start a game. 2. The bot will send a puzzle, like (A¹)(_¹¹)(U²¹). The small number is the clue. 3. Guess the hidden letters. You can guess one, some, or all of them at once. 4. To answer, send a message (in a private chat) or reply to the puzzle message (in a group). 5. If your guess is correct, the bot will automatically fill it in for you!
help_text_whatiscrypto: 📖 What is Cryptography & Caesar Cipher? Cryptography is the science of hiding information. We use a cipher, which is a set of rules, to turn readable text into a secret code. This game uses the Caesar Cipher, one of the oldest ciphers. It works by 'shifting' the position of each letter in the alphabet. For example, with a shift of 1: A becomes B (value 2) B becomes C (value 3) Each puzzle in this bot can have a different shift, making it more challenging!
help_text_commands: ⌨️ Command List /crypto [level] - Start a new game (levels: easy, medium, hard, veryhard). /surrender or /menyerah - Give up on the current puzzle. /score - Check your current score. /profile - View your profile. /leaderboard - See the global top 10 players. /lang [en|id] - Change the bot's language. /help - Show this help menu.
